content:
The unit of special operations forces destroyed 10 units of heavy and auto equipment of the enemy in the Zaporozhye direction.

This is stated in the SCO message in a telegram channel.

One of the SCO units effectively worked in the Zaporozhye direction. Operators have inflicted firing defeats FPV-Drons for hostile purposes.

Successful lesions were damaged and destroyed: SUU 2C7 "Pion", CAU 2C1 "Carnation", two 122 mm howitzers D-30, APC and five units of automotive equipment.

As reported by the Armyinform, for the last day of defense forcesDestroyed10 Russian tanks, 30 artillery systems and 35 combat armored vehicles.
title: SCOs burned 10 units of enemy equipment in the Zaporozhye direction a day
description: This is stated in the SCO message in a telegram channel. One of the SCO units is effective ...
author: Army Inform
